passives.name: Char
passives.effects: Your next ability hit applies a Burn that deals +0 to 2000% maximum health difference (+ +0 to 2000% maximum health difference per 1 Lethality) lethality (based on maximum health difference) hp of the target's current health physical damage seconds over 4 seconds. (+0 to 2000% maximum health difference (+ +0 to 2000% maximum health difference per 1 Lethality) lethality (based on maximum health difference) hp of the target's current health physical damage every 0.5s over 4 seconds.)
